name: Meowsical Mains: Kitty Krews Big Break!
name_original: Meowsical Mains: Kitty Krews Big Break!
description:
Meowsical Mains is a character-focused rhythm game. Choose between different cats with unique stats and abilities to take on songs on Kitty Krew's journey to becoming the world's biggest band!

Compete with others to reach the top spot on the leaderboards!

This game is playable on:
PC
Andriod (soon)

How to play (IMPORTANT):
This is an early build so no instructions are included in-game.

Up Arrow: Hit high notes
Down Arrow: Hit low notes
Right Arrow: Activate Star Power

Made by:

Game Designers & Programmers:
Nora Luck-Jennings
Josh Ayala
Jackson Symss
Wilma Signal
